Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen ProjectileShootingBouncing is a class for projectiles that have both shooting and bouncing abilities.

int  bounceCount,
float  elasticity
) 
 

Constructs a new projectile.

Parameters:
name Name of the projectile.
description Description of the projectile.
price Price of the projectile.
spriteIndex Index of the sprite.
soundIndex Index of the firing sound.
explosionIndex Index of the explosion type.
radius Radius of the projectile.
mass Mass of the projectile.
damage Maximum damage of the projectile.
damageRadius Radius of the damage.
ammunition Projectile template to shoot.
shotCount Maximum ammunition. After all ammunition has been fired, projectile will destruct.
shotDelay Delay between two shots in ms.
shotVelocity Shooting velocity for shots.
bounceCount Number of jumps to take before destruction.
elasticity Percentage (0-1) of remaining energy.

Constructs a projectile with same properties.

virtual Projectile* ProjectileShootingBouncing::getCopy (   )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Returns a dynamic copy. Makes it possible to get a copy without knowing which subclass the object actually represents. Every subclass must overwrite this function.

Returns:
Dynamic copy of itself.
